alert.note: Alert for Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 2:50PM CDT until August 04 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Grant County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... East central Saline County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 249 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ironton, or near Southwest Little Rock, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... White Hall... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Redfield... Ironton... Pine Bluff Arsenal... East End... Orion... Sweet Home... Hensley Island... Mabelvale... State Fairgrounds... Geyer Springs... Baseline... Sherrill... Tucker... Pastoria... Higgins... Wright... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: chances to the north. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
